data:
## class_BaseWidgetDirective
An abstract base class for widget directives, providing common functionality
for Angular components that interact with widgets.

### Type Parameters

• **W** *extends* [`Widget`](../types#widget)

The type of the widget.

### Implements

- [`OnChanges`](https://angular.dev/api/core/OnChanges)
- [`OnInit`](https://angular.dev/api/core/OnInit)
- [`AfterContentChecked`](https://angular.dev/api/core/AfterContentChecked)

### Accessors

#### api

##### Get Signature

> **get** **api**(): `W`\[`"api"`\]

Retrieves the widget api

###### Returns

`W`\[`"api"`\]

the widget api

***

#### directives

##### Get Signature

> **get** **directives**(): `W`\[`"directives"`\]

Retrieves the widget directives

###### Returns

`W`\[`"directives"`\]

the widget directives

***

#### state

##### Get Signature

> **get** **state**(): [`AngularState`](../types#angularstate)\<`W`\>

Retrieves the widget state. Each property of the state is exposed through an Angular [Signal](https://angular.dev/api/core/Signal)

###### Returns

[`AngularState`](../types#angularstate)\<`W`\>

the widget state

## function_callWidgetFactoryWithConfig
> **callWidgetFactoryWithConfig**\<`W`\>(`parameter`): [`AngularWidget`](../types#angularwidget)\<`W`\>

Call a widget factory using provided configs.

### Type Parameters

• **W** *extends* [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<`object`, `object`, `object`, `object`\>

### Parameters

#### parameter

the parameter

##### afterInit

(`widget`) => `void`

a callback to call after successful setup of the widget

##### defaultConfig

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\> \| [`ReadableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/ReadableSignal.html)\<`undefined` \| [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\>\>

the default config of the widget

##### events

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`Pick`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#picktype-keys)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>, keyof [`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\> & \`on$\{string\}\`\>\>

the events of the widget

##### factory

[`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<`W`\>

the widget factory to call

##### slotChildren

() => `undefined` \| [`TemplateRef`](https://angular.dev/api/core/TemplateRef)\<`void`\>

a function to provide the default children slot using a view query

##### slotTemplates

() => \{ \[K in string \| number \| symbol as IsSlotContent\<WidgetProps\<W\>\[K\]\> extends 0 ? never : K\]: WidgetProps\<W\>\[K\] extends SlotContent\<U\> ? undefined \| TemplateRef\<U\> : never \}

a function to provide all slot templates using child queries

##### widgetConfig

`null` \| [`ReadableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/ReadableSignal.html)\<`undefined` \| [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\>\>

the config of the widget, overriding the defaultConfig

### Returns

[`AngularWidget`](../types#angularwidget)\<`W`\>

the widget
